title: Public transport for the Red Hot Chili Peppers Concert: Tuesday 7 February 2023
articleContent:
Public transport for the Red Hot Chili Peppers Concert: Tuesday 7 February 2023

Legendary rock band Red Hot Chili Peppers is returning to Marvel Stadium. Public transport is your best way to enjoy it, to see the Red Hot Chili Peppers. Extra services will help you get home from Marvel Stadium on Tuesday 7 February.

The gates open at 5:00pm.

Before you travel

Plan your journey using Journey Planner and check Disruptions for service changes that may affect your journey.

 Metropolitan train

Arriving at Southern Cross before the concert, as follows:

  • Craigieburn departing at 5:51pm, arriving on Platform 11 at 6:48pm
  • Sunbury departing at 6:06pm, arriving on Platform 11 at 6:28pm

Trains depart Southern Cross after the concert ends, as follows:

  • Mernda departing at 11:21pm and 11:52pm, Platform 9
  • Eltham departing at 11:29pm, Platform 9
  • Greensborough departing at 12:00am, Platform 9
  • Flinders Street via loop departing at 11:08pm, 11:11pm, 11:08pm, 11:19pm, 11:38pm, 11:41pm, 11:54pm and 12:09am from Platform 9 
  • Sunbury departing at 11:15pm and 11:25pm, Platform 12
  • Craigieburn departing at 11:10pm and 11:30pm, Platform 11

Trains depart Flinders Street after the concert ends, as follows:

  • Lilydale departing at 11:53pm, Platform 3
  • Belgrave departing at 11:38pm, Platform 3
  • Glen Waverley departing at 11:42pm and 11:55pm, Platform 4
  • Frankston departing at 11:45pm and 11:55pm, Platform 7

Plan your journey using Journey Planner.

 Metropolitan tram

Getting to and from Marvel Stadium

Extra trams will operate as Route 30a between East Melbourne and Stop D1 Etihad Stadium via La Trobe Street, and as Route 86a between East Melbourne and Stop D1 Etihad Stadium via Bourke Street.

Plan your journey using Journey Planner.

 Metropolitan bus

Getting to and from Marvel Stadium

Customers can catch the following bus routes close to Marvel Stadium:

  • Route 232 (Altona North to City)
  • Route 235 (Fishermans Bend to City)
  • Route 302 (Box Hill to City)
  • Route 304 (Doncaster SC to City)
  • Route 905 (The Pines SC to City)
  • Route 906 (Warrandyte to City)
  • Route 907 (Mitcham to City)

Plan your journey using Journey Planner.

 Regional train

Normal services departing from Southern Cross Station.

Trains depart Southern Cross after the concert ends, as follows:

  • Additional service to Bendigo leaving at 11:57pm.

Additional Coaches:

  • Leaving Coach terminal for Seymour
  • Leaving Coach terminal for Geelong
  • Leaving Coach terminal for Waurn Ponds
  • Leaving Coach terminal for Wendouree

Plan your journey using Journey planner.
articleDescription: Public transport for the Red Hot Chili Peppers Concert: Tuesday 7 February 2023
